html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12352024-11-22ECCC, NA, PARKS
ActMackenzie Valley Resource Management Act
Canada National Parks Act
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectNational Parks of Canada Land Use Planning Regulations
PrecisNATIONAL PARKS OF CANADA LAND USE PLANNING REGULATIONS in order to (1) repeal and consolidate the National Parks Building Regulations, 1968, National Parks of Canada Cottages Regulations, 1979, National Parks Signs Regulations, 1956, and Town of Jasper Zoning Regulations, 1968; (2) introduce new requirements; (3) repeal existing fees; and (4) make minor administrative amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0230 Publication Date: 2024-12-04
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: NATIONAL PARKS OF CANADA LAND USE PLANNING REGULATIONS in order to (1) repeal and consolidate the National Parks Building Regulations, 1968, National Parks of Canada Cottages Regulations, 1979, National Parks Signs Regulations, 1956, and Town of Jasper Zoning Regulations, 1968; (2) introduce new requirements; (3) repeal existing fees; and (4) make minor administrative amendments.
